text: int main ( void ) { int t , n , m , i , j , k , l , r , d , s , a [ 101 ] [ 101 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } d = n ; m = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { s = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= d ; j ++ ) { s = s + a [ j ] [ i ] ; } if ( s > m ) { m = s ; } d -- ; } printf ( "%d\n" , m + 1 ) ; } return 0 ; }
